import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchGrades } from "../../services/gradeServices" import { fetchSubjects } from "../../services/subjectServices" export const CreateWorksheet = ({ user }) => { const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const [subjects, setSubjects] = useState([]) const [worksheetForm, setWorksheetForm] = useState({}) const handleWorksheetFetchCalls = () => { fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) fetchSubjects().then((data) => { setSubjects(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleWorksheetFetchCalls() }, []) return ( <>
{/* add flex stretch to this? */}
